nodes.bodyText: We seemed to have a lot of static imports. This might be necessary in this place but I would like to point out this: https://stackoverflow.com/a/162195/3599535
It is not recommended by java
Ack. We will be cleaning this up once BString is migrated. This is one-to-one Ballerina to Java migration so thats why you are seeing static method imports.
